description:
A pocket bird guide written in Jetpack Compose.
Birdpedia is a guide to the birds of the world, comprised of data from leading authorities like eBird/Cornell Lab, BirdLife International, and all the contributors to AviList. This app would not be possible without their work!

The birds are presented in alphabetical order by taxon and scientific name. Scroll to view more birds, or filter by name in the filter bar. Click on a bird to view more information about it on eBird. Navigate to settings to change the theme, toggle the display of IUCN Red List markers, or change the region to show birds for.
